approachCards.card_1_desc: moving quickly no cutting corners — delivering clean builds fast, then refinig with precision.
approachCards.card_2_desc: Every component I craft is intentional — I obsess over alignment, spacing, and visual clarity.
approachCards.card_3_desc: From the smallest screens up, I design interfaces that feel smooth, natural, and touch-friendly.
approachCards.card_4_desc: Whether in code or communication, I keep things clear — no guesswork, no messy logic.

processCards.card_1_desc: We align on the must-haves. I listen, ask the hard questions, and craft a clear project roadmap before the first line of code.
processCards.card_2_desc: I switch to UI/UX (Figma). Every pixel is intentional—obsessed over alignment, spacing, and a clean, touch-friendly feel across all screen sizes.
processCards.card_3_desc: Moving quickly, no cutting corners. I deliver a clean, component-based front-end build and integrate the BaaS (Firebase/Supabase) for rapid functionality.
processCards.card_4_desc: Instant follow-up! I deploy the build to a free host like Vercel right away so you can test it live. We refine with precision based on your real-time feedback.
processCards.card_5_desc: Clean code, no guesswork. We finalize the production build and I hand over everything—clear documentation, reusable components, and a smooth deployment process.
processCards.card_6_desc: I don't vanish post-launch. Bug fixes, feature tweaks, or scaling questions—I'm here to ensure your project stays sharp and adapts as your needs evolve, officially with a support contract or per request payment.
